ctx: intros E E' Hord E'' p p'.
exceptions.tactic: apply ord_ext with (E' := E') (p' := p) (p'' := p').
exceptions.exn: In environment E, E' : Ens Hord : EQ E E' E'' : Ens p : INC E'' E p' : INC E'' E' Hord' : ord E E'' p The term "p" has type "forall E0 : Ens, IN E0 E'' -> IN E0 E" while it is expected to have type "forall E0 : Ens, IN E0 E' -> IN E0 ?E" (cannot unify "IN E0 E'" and "IN E0 E''").

ctx: intros E E' Hord E'' p p'.
exceptions.exn: In environment E, E' : Ens Hord : EQ E E' E'' : Ens p : INC E'' E p' : INC E'' E' Hord' : ord E E'' p Unable to unify "forall E : Ens, IN E ?M1419 -> IN E ?M1420" with "(fix F (e : Ens) : (fun E : Ens => forall E' : Ens, INC E' E -> Prop) e := match e as e0 return ((fun E : Ens => forall E' : Ens, INC E' E -> Prop) e0) with | sup A e0 => (fun (A0 : Type) (f : A0 -> Ens) (HR : forall (a : A0) (E' : Ens), INC E' (f a) -> Prop) (E' : Ens) (_ : INC E' (sup A0 f)) => (forall a : A0, IN (f a) E' -> HR a (f a) (INC_refl (f a))) /\\ (forall (a : A0) (e1 : Ens), IN (f a) E' -> forall p : INC e1 (f a), HR a e1 p -> IN e1 E')) A e0 (fun a : A => F (e0 a)) end) E' E'' p'".

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros E E' Hord E'' p p'.
exceptions.tactic: apply ord_ext with (E' := E) (p' := p') (p'' := p).

original: intros E E' Hord E'' p p'. split. - intros Hord'. apply ord_ext with (E' := E') (p' := p) (p'' := p'). + apply INC_sound_left with (E := E''); auto. + apply INC_sound_right with (E := E''); auto. - intros Hord'. apply ord_ext with (E' := E) (p' := p') (p'' := p). + apply INC_sound_left with (E := E''); auto. + apply INC_sound_right with (E := E''); auto.
